title: Bound to You
description: You want it, you got it…  Whether it's tickets for special events or reservations for hotels and restaurants, Sophie Ashton is a networking ninja. As a personal concierge for the rich and elite, she has very little personal time and no desire for romance, but she always time for sex—except at work. A lesson she learned the hard way. But when she meets her new client, a sexy-as-hell CEO, she knows she’s in trouble. Worse, she knows she’ll like it.  Xavier Quinn needs Sophie. Her skills as a concierge make her the only person with enough finesse and connections to help him win a coveted contract. The problem is the attraction between them is too strong to fight. Mixing work and play never ends well, but what’s a little risk when the rewards are so delicious? Flipping caution the bird, Xavier convinces Sophie to surrender to their erotic desires, but the stakes have never been higher.  Pleasing a billionaire client like Xavier could change the game for Sophie, but if she loses the contract, her reputation might not be the only thing broken.  Second Edition 2018  AT YOUR SERVICE SERIES Bound to You - June 2018 Surrender to You - July 2018
author: Shawntelle Madison
